A sudden whizz and a thin plume of smoke rise from behind Blackfang's 
head and he is locked in place, seemingly frozen.

The med-scanner's report is grim. Many of the bot's logic circuits are 
damaged beyond repair, but still operate. In short, it has driven him 
from being the valiant black knight to the dark stalker.

Replacing the circuits would be possible, but very jeopardizing for 
Blackfang's spark. That is the one intact part inside him.

OOC: Trying to replace the circuits will only kill him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Wheeljack blinks.  "Other wolf?  Whaddya talkin' about?"
> 
> He checks the readout on his med-scanner.
> 
> OOC: What's the scanner pick up, azure?  As in, what's wrong with 
> Blackfang?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Even though he could not move, Blackfang tried to say something. 
The 
> > paralysis he was in allowed him nly to whisper, but the rest of 
his 
> > body did not respond.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Jackie... Other Wolf... Warrior... Need help... Far...
